description: Try our easy to follow Msemen (Flat Bread) With Honey & Pistachios recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Msemen (Flat Bread) With Honey & Pistachios Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook, in batches, for 3 minutes each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a plate. Keep warm. Serve drizzled with honey and topped with pistachio and watermelon.
